channel.title: Updates on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Updates on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: What's New in December 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Before you dive in Dwarves is operated as a 50% company, 50% community. Everything we learn along the way of work, we transform into knowledge and distribute back to our tech community.

item.title: Labs Roadmap (Nov 23 update)
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In a recent collaborative discussion between key members of the Labs and Consulting teams, we’ve made decisive strides in pinpointing key topics and potential projects for development.

item.title: Forward Engineering August 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: As we step into the exciting opportunities of August, we are at a crucial point in the ever-changing world of technology.

item.title: Forward Engineering June 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: As we usher in the month of June, we embrace the ever-changing landscape of technological innovation, recognizing that every twist and turn propels us forward into a world of limitless possibilities.

item.title: Community Bounty
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: As you may know,¬†Dwarves Discord network¬†is where we connect with our friends, alumni, and like-minded people. Bounties are rewards (in ICY - Dwarves‚Äô token) given out to community members for work that encourages community developers to get more involved in the development outside of their core skills.

item.title: Forward Engineering May 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The technological landscape is vast, brimming with opportunities for exploration and growth. As we stand on the brink of May, we pause to reflect on our journey thus far and chart our course forward.

item.title: Discord Roles
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: To organize our discord and make it fun to interact between community members, we setup those roles for specific purposes. They are ladder-based and function-based roles.

item.title: Happy 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: As we enter a new year, I want to reflect on the role that software has played in my life. From the early days of my career to now, software has been a constant presence and something that I have dedicated countless hours to as both an engineer and project manager.

item.title: 2022 In Review
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Successfully went through 2022, a year that we might say - a new record: team reached highest growth record, kickstarted community engagement, home, compliance training & individual development are speeding up, and a whole new place to call Dwarves.

item.title: Dwarves Of The Year 2022
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Dwarves of The Year 2022 - Wins to Celebrate It’s been a long journey, but we’ve finally made it to 2022 and what a year it’s been for our team of Dwarves.

item.title: Forward Engineering Year 2022
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What is Learning at Dwarves? At Dwarves Foundation, we believe that learning is one of the most important aspects of any organization.

item.title: Dwarves Summit 2022 Engineering A Good Time
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Dwarves Summit 2022: Engineering a good time We don‚Äôt treat team bonding the common way because we understand our engineers.

item.title: Configure The Company Email
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Make sure you have 2FA enabled For this method to work, you need to have¬†two factor authentification¬†enabled for your Google account.

item.title: The Next Leading Chairs
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Our vision for growth Last Jan 2020, we got the chance to celebrate our first milestone -¬†Dwarves Foundation reached 5 years old.

item.title: The future is blockchain and data
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: It‚Äôs Han and Nikki here, Plus an extra fresh voice we‚Äôre bringing to Dwarves Updates, in hope we can offer you more engineering-related insights and thoughts.

item.title: What's New in May 2022
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Foundation Project Allocation We concluded the partnership with Relay and Eklipse. It has been a fun (and wild) ride for some of you.

item.title: The stages of hiring at Dwarves
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Hey, It‚Äôs Han and Nikki, back in your inbox for another Dwarves Updates. First, we are delighted to share that Dwarves placed top 100 in the Financial Times‚Äô Asia-Pacific High-Growth Company.

item.title: January 2022 Updates

item.description: Project Highlights MStation as our latest blockchain-based project It‚Äôs the first BSCS Metaverse blockchain game on Binance Smart Chain (BSC).

item.description: Project Highlights MStation as our latest blockchain-based project It’s the first BSCS Metaverse blockchain game on Binance Smart Chain (BSC).

item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Moving with Blockchain We shift our focus to real deals. Meanwhile, #blockchain #web3 channels are there for the Dwarves to learn & exchange their knowns.

item.description: Moving with Blockchain We shift our focus to real deals. Meanwhile, #blockchain #web3 channels are there for the Dwarves to learn & exchange their knowns.

item.title: Dwarves Of The Year 2021
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Dwarves of 2021 - We met at last ‚ô° Apart from the team’s voting result for each title, the team leads also selected the Honorable Mention and Client Endorsed, as we want to honor all of the hard work.

item.title: It's a wrap: 2021 in Review
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Hey, it‚Äôs Han and Nikki in your inbox again. On behalf of the entire Dwarves team, happy 2022! For us 2021 is eventful, and memorable.

item.title: Engineering organizational structure
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Greetings, It’s Han and Nikki from Team Dwarves. We’re almost at the end of this year. While we know everyone is busy wrapping up 2021, we hope you’re taking care of yourself and staying safe.

item.title: The path to growth at Dwarves
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Greetings, It’s Han and Nikki from Team Dwarves. We’re here with the fifth edition of our Dwarves Updates. October has been a wild ride for us as a company.

item.title: Project Compliance
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Hey, It’s Han & Nikki from Team Dwarves. This email is the third month we share about our journey to Software Craftsmanship.

item.title: Da Lat Office
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Hey, It’s Han and the Dwarves team again. We work as a borderless software firm by crafting world-class products that bring great impacts for various industries.

item.title: Dwarves Updates
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Hi, this is Han, the CEO of Dwarves Foundation. This month the Dwarves score 40th client that we have the honor to serve.

item.title: 2020 In Review
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Wrapping up 2019 with the first 5th-year milestone, many ideas popped up for the next steps. Heading into a new decade means we get to wrap up the old and in with the new.

item.title: Introduce To Dwarves Memo
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Every company has a story. We just decide to have more than one. As the years go by, our stories get piled up.

item.title: 2019 In Review
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Another year has gone by. And we just celebrated the 5th year that we survived all the challenges. Everyone was facing their own, but I have seen many of you reaching new stages and achieve new targets.

item.title: 2018 In Review
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: 2018 was the memorable year with lots of achievements. We adapted the new team structure. We defined things we value and live that culture tediously.
